description: Only trade when the asset trades above a long-term moving average or similar momentum condition.
Rank candidates by momentum (EntryScore) and allocate up to a defined number of positions.
snippet:
Strategy: RankAllocate
    EntrySetup: C > MA(C, 150)
    EntryScore: ROC(C, 63)
    MaxEntries: 5

description: Suspend entries while a drawdown metric exceeds a threshold.
snippet:
Data:
    MarketDrawdown: (Highest(C, 252) - C) / Highest(C, 252)
Strategy: GuardedEntries
    EntrySkip: MarketDrawdown > 0.15

description: Scale position size inversely to volatility (ATR) to target consistent risk.
snippet:
Strategy: VolAdjust
    Volatility: ATR(14)
    PositionSize: (0.01 * S.Equity) / Volatility

description: Use Parameters and Item() to distribute capital across fixed-weight sleeves (All Weather style).
snippet:
Parameters:
    allocSPY: 30
    allocTLT: 40
Strategy: AllWeather
    Quantity: Item("alloc{?}", ?symbol)
    QtyType: Percent
